name: opencode-gemini-auth
description: Gemini authentication plugin for OpenCode - connect your Google account to use Gemini models directly in OpenCode.

installation.summary: Install via npm and authenticate with your Google account to access Gemini models.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install opencode-gemini-auth
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["opencode-gemini-auth"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode and authenticate with your Google account.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

1. Install the plugin
2. Authenticate with Google
3. Access Gemini models in OpenCode

## Supported Models

- Gemini Pro
- Gemini Pro Vision
- Other Gemini variants

Use your Google account credentials to authenticate and start using Google's latest AI models.
